title: How to Create a Custom Character in Rock Band 3

steps.headline: Start the game and turn on a controller or plastic instrument.
steps.description: Press the Start button to enter the main menu and select "Customization".

steps.headline: Select the "Create" button to create and customize your character.
steps.description: *Now you can choose a name, gender, skin colour, facial features, body type, haircut, facial hair and a basic outfit here. Just play around with the options until you have your desired look. Select "Create" when you are done modifying your character. Beware: you cannot go back to change facial features, body types, skin colour and gender later on, so be sure you are happy with your character before finishing it!

steps.headline: Dress up your character.
steps.description: From the main menu, select "Customization", and then "Edit Character" to enter the in-game store, where you can get free clothes, accessories, instruments, makeup and tattoos for your rock star alter ego. While many of the clothes and features in the game are available from the start, some features, like tattoos, need to be unlocked by finishing career goals. Exit the store when you are finished dressing your character up.

steps.headline: If you want to play as another character sometime, simply press Start, select "Characters" and find the one you want to play as.
Make your own virtual bandmates to play with you on stage by using  the above steps.
steps.description: When you are finished creating your band characters, go to the Customization menu and select "Edit Band Info". Assign "stand ins" to replace the default characters playing your drums, guitar, bass or singing with your own bandmates.

steps.headline: Enjoy living out your rock n' roll fantasies!

text: Start the game and turn on a controller or plastic instrument. Press the Start button to enter the main menu and select "Customization". Select the "Create" button to create and customize your character. *Now you can choose a name, gender, skin colour, facial features, body type, haircut, facial hair and a basic outfit here. Just play around with the options until you have your desired look. Select "Create" when you are done modifying your character. Beware: you cannot go back to change facial features, body types, skin colour and gender later on, so be sure you are happy with your character before finishing it! Dress up your character. From the main menu, select "Customization", and then "Edit Character" to enter the in-game store, where you can get free clothes, accessories, instruments, makeup and tattoos for your rock star alter ego. While many of the clothes and features in the game are available from the start, some features, like tattoos, need to be unlocked by finishing career goals. Exit the store when you are finished dressing your character up. If you want to play as another character sometime, simply press Start, select "Characters" and find the one you want to play as.  Make your own virtual bandmates to play with you on stage by using  the above steps. When you are finished creating your band characters, go to the Customization menu and select "Edit Band Info". Assign "stand ins" to replace the default characters playing your drums, guitar, bass or singing with your own bandmates. Enjoy living out your rock n' roll fantasies!
